name.description: A unique identifier that defaults to the index value
name.description_zh: 唯一标识符，默认为索引值

icon.description: The icon name or image link on the left side of the title bar is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
icon.description_zh: 标题栏左侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

size.description_zh: 标题栏大小，可选值为 large

title.description: Content on the left side of the title bar

value.description: Content to the right of the title bar

label.description: The title bar describes the information

border.description: Whether to display the inner border

is-link.description: Whether to display the arrow on the right side of the title bar and turn on Click feedback
is-link.description_zh: 是否展示标题栏右侧箭头并开启点击反馈

readonly.description: Whether it is in the read-only state, and the panel cannot be operated in the read-only state
readonly.description_zh: 是否为只读状态，只读状态下无法操作面板

lazy-render.description: Whether the panel content is rendered when it is first expanded
lazy-render.description_zh: 是否在首次展开时才渲染面板内容

title-class.description: Additional class names in the header on the left

value-class.description: The content on the right side has an additional class name

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggle the expanded state of the panel, pass 'true' to expand, 'false' to collapse, and no parameters to switch
methods.description_zh: 切换面板展开状态，传 `true` 为展开，`false` 为收起，不传参为切换

slots.name: title
slots.description: Customize the content on the left side of the title bar
slots.description_zh: 自定义标题栏左侧内容

slots.name: value
slots.description: Customize the content on the right side of the title bar
slots.description_zh: 自定义标题栏右侧内容

slots.name: label
slots.description_zh: 自定义标题栏描述信息

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Customize the icon on the left side of the title bar
slots.description_zh: 自定义标题栏左侧图标

slots.name: right-icon
slots.description: Customize the icon to the right of the title bar
slots.description_zh: 自定义标题栏右侧图标
